item.title: CFTC Chair Caroline Pham Expected To Join MoonPay After Departure: Report
item.description:
Caroline Pham has reiterated plans to step down from the CFTC once a new chair is named, with speculation suggesting she may join MoonPay. Brian Quintenz’s nomination for CFTC chair has yet to be confirmed, drawing both industry support and opposition amid ethics concerns tied to his past roles.

item.title: US to Publish Official Statistics on the Blockchain – Why It Matters Now
item.description:
The U.S. Commerce Department has outlined plans to place GDP and other economic statistics onto blockchain to strengthen transparency and prevent tampering. The step follows H.R. 1664 and wider policy initiatives under the Trump administration to expand blockchain adoption in federal operations.

The post US to Publish Official Statistics on the Blockchain – Why It Matters Now appeared first on Cryptonews.
